text: Which LINQ syntax do you prefer?
LINQ is one of the greatest improvements to .NET since generics and it saves me tons of time, and lines of code.
However, the fluent syntax seems to come much more natural to me than the query expression syntax.

code:
var title = entries.Where(e => e.Approved)
    .OrderBy(e => e.Rating).Select(e => e.Title)
    .FirstOrDefault();

var query = (from e in entries
             where e.Approved
             orderby e.Rating
             select e.Title).FirstOrDefault();

text: Which do you prefer and if you write standards for your company, do you enforce one over the other?
